From: "Moon Mist" <shadowwarrior_ax@...>



*BrightBlade had seen Gangon run off towards some mountain and had followed 
him, she had been surprised that the bot to come from the stasis pod had 
been a horse but the surprise disappeared quickly. She had looked over at 
the strange horse when it had transformed and studied it's structure, simply 
normal and nothing more. BrightBlade was disappointed, she had though that 
if anything was to come out of that pod it was to be some sort of strong 
bot, not some horse that new nothing other then to flit it's hair about!
She looked at Gangon, his jaw dropped at the bot's beauty, why was it men 
always fell for something that knew how to strut about? The question 
confused her but at least this new bot could serve Hell Beast, just as she 
and Gangon had been.
BrightBlade transformed into her robot mode and then walked around the new 
bot, judging it even closer. She then stopped in front of it and crossed her 
arms, not much to her taste but she could tell without a doubt that Gangon 
liked it.
She snapper her head towards him with a sharp snarl.*

" Close that yap of your's, you arachnid bafoon!You're making a mockery of 
yourself!!"

* She then looked back at the new bot, her optics narrowing to mear slits.*

" Not much power in THIS thing but as long as it's loyal to My Lord Hell 
Beast it may be usefull."
